reviewText:
I bought this from ebay or here -  i don't remember which and i was disappointed.
This film does not explain much about Kabbalah. It goes in to were it started and raises questions it does not answer.
if you are wanting to study or are looking for information about Kabbalah this is not for you.
If you are a student writing a report on this topic or are jest wanting to know what it is, then it is for you.
